summary: Multiple coins (ADA, ETH, SOL) are showing strong overbought signals with RSI-7 well above 70 and price above Bollinger upper bands, presenting short opportunities. BTC and BNB are neutral but BTC shows MACD turning positive—however, overbought conditions dominate elsewhere. Aggressive short entries on ADA, ETH, and SOL are justified.

ADA.justification: RSI-7 at 75.47 (overbought), price above EMA-20 and Bollinger upper band, strong uptrend exhausted, volume below average suggesting weak continuation.

ETH.justification: RSI-7 at 73.73, price above upper Bollinger band, MACD rising but overbought RSI and low volume (30% of average) suggest reversal risk.

SOL.justification: RSI-7 at 81.93 (extremely overbought), price above EMA-20, MACD positive but volume only 27% of average—classic exhaustion setup.

BTC.justification: MACD just turned positive and price above EMA-20, but RSI-7 at 72.9 is elevated. Neutral Bollinger position and low volume make direction uncertain—wait for confirmation.

BNB.justification: RSI-7 dropped sharply to 46.6 from 64, MACD just turned positive but volume extremely low (6% of average). No clear edge—avoid.

actions.reason: Overbought RSI-7, price above Bollinger upper band, low volume—prime short setup.
RSI-7 overbought, price above upper Bollinger, weak volume—short with tight risk.
Extreme RSI-7 overbought signal, low volume rally—high conviction short.

BTC shows strong MACD breakout and price above EMA-20, justifying holding the long. ADA is overbought but lacks volume confirmation; close short if any, but we don’t have one. Current SOL short is losing—consider closing due to strong uptrend and rising RSI. ETH short is barely profitable but overbought; hold with tight stop. BTC long is working—add to it aggressively.

ADA.justification: Price above EMA-20 and MACD slightly positive, but RSI-7 dropped sharply from 82 to 67—overbought but losing momentum. Volume below average. No position open, and risk/reward isn’t compelling enough to open new position.

BTC.justification: Strong MACD crossover (from -68 to +4.9 in 10 periods), price above EMA-20, and steady uptrend. RSI-7 at 79 is high but RSI-14 only at 61—room to run. Volume stable. High-conviction long.

ETH.justification: Overbought (RSI-7=73, above upper Bollinger), but MACD still rising. Current short is slightly profitable. Hold to capture potential reversal, but monitor closely—don’t add.

SOL.justification: RSI-7 at 88.5, but price in strong uptrend, MACD accelerating upward, and above EMA-20. Short position is losing (-3.79%) and fundamentals contradict bearish bet. Cut loss before it widens.

SOLUSDT.justification: RSI-7 at extreme 92.5, but short is at -5.78% and price still rising. Volume is below average, but risk of further squeeze is high. Better to cut before hitting -8%.
